summary:
Adds New Plants, Ingredients, Buildings, Merchants, a Follower and an enemy Werewolf.
Wrapped in a small Quest on a find letter system, this mod implements the usage of a Plant based on Cannabis into Skyrim.
Eashab is growable, edible and smokable. and used for crafting Eashashin Clothing and Daggers.
This Mod is based on Cannabis S
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000]Beware[/color]: This mod adds Cannabis related content.


This mod is based on Cannabis Skyrim by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2345988]MadNuttah[/url] and Virakotxa.
I found the Shop infront of Whiterun unimmersive so i changed it.
And tried to find an immersive way to implement the weed into the game. 

Its called Eashab based on An Arabic Word used for Herb.
It comes in 

[list]
[*][color=#93c47d]Common [/color][color=#d8d8d8](Alteration),[/color]
[*][color=#76a5af]Pale [/color][color=#b6b6b6](Illusion)[/color][color=#76a5af] [/color]
[*][color=#00ff00]Bright [/color][color=#d8d8d8](Restoration)[/color]
[*][color=#a64d79]Purple[/color][color=#00ff00] [/color][color=#d8d8d8](Conjuration)[/color]
[/list]

I moved Eashab business to the underground and[color=#ff7700]
had to remove the[/color] "[color=#00ff00]YOUR HIGHNESS[/color]" cannabis shop. ;/

Replaced with a
[color=#ff7700]Burnt Farm [/color]that can act as a beginners Playerhome, aswell as

[color=#cc4125][b]START[/b] [/color]the [color=#00ff00]Quest[/color] by giving the first hint.
The Quest includes meeting Eashab Dealers.
Those complete the very limited selection The Khaijit Caravans have to offer. Aswell as allow you to grow Eashab.
One Merchant will most likely be met thru a playthrough, The Second one has to be Unlocked!

The Quest is lowkey, It uses letters and wont show as an actual quest!!
You pretty much find the next hint (Letter/Note) always in the area you were sent to from the Burnt Farm on.

3 Spells can be learned:

[list]
[*]"[color=#ffd966]Fiery Aura[/color]" ﻿ ﻿Fire Cloak that lasts a long time but drains your magicka slowly.
[*]"[color=#00ffff]Frosty Aura[/color]"  ﻿  Frost Cloak that lasts a long time but drains your magicka slowly.
[*]"[color=#00ff00]Reeking Robe[/color]" ﻿A Cloakspell so smelly it staggers your opponents, but comes with a backlash.
[/list]
The Reeking Robe aswell as the Filled Dragon Pipe are considered the most powerfull additions to the Game.
Besides Sana Ora.


You may find a hint during the Quest when obtaining [color=#00ff00]Philis[/color][color=#efefef] Thar[/color]´s Letter.
And meet [color=#ffd966]Sana Ora[/color][color=#ff7700] [/color][color=#efefef]a potential Follower fighting an enchanted immortal Creature.
You pretty much find the next hint (Letter/Note) always in the area you were sent to from the Burnt Farm on.
[/color][color=#ffff00]
Sana Ora[/color] is a strong female Fire Mage and College of Windhelm drop-out.
She is surrounded in a fiery Aura; and easily steals your show by looks and dealt damage. ;)
[color=#e69138]She uses only vanilla assets but is unique in its way.[/color]

You will discover her home, 
[color=#ffff00]The Witchhouse[/color], that can act as your Playerhome. (Navmeshed and All)
It has a discoverable Fast Travel Point on its small balcony, overlooking [color=#6aa84f]Falkreath[/color].
The Witchhouse is not your typical playerhome. It has 2 seperate Wardrobes for example :)
[color=#e69138]It uses almost only vanilla assets but is unique in its way.[/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]


[/color]Almost all Craftable [color=#00ff00]"Potions"[/color]fortify 2 Handed Weapons and a Magic School, some slighly buff Alchemy, some give you the berserkers rage.
Others will knock you down and leave you paralized. (for 5 minutes) :) 

"[color=#00ff00]Potions[/color]" contain,
Common, Pale, Bright and Purple version of:

[list]
[*]The Eashab Seed (edible food)
[*]The Eashab (edible weak potion)
[*]The Wrapped Eashab ) (smokeable, medium strong, medium lengh durattion)
[*]The Filled Eashab Pipes (smokable, strong, short duration)
[*]Edible Eashab and Eashab Treat (medium strong, long duration)
[/list]
Aswell as [color=#76a5af]Eashab Essence[/color] and [color=#f6b26b]Wrapped Elves Ear[/color]  /  Pipes filled with Elves Ear.

Potions should be balanced, also by the fact that they can take effort to obtain.
All the mods items aim to be potentialy strong but negligible if wanted. Favoring maybe certain Mage and Assassin Builds.
(For those of you that wish to play with it being merely an uncommon presence in the game, like Skooma)

Many "Potions" have the negative [color=#b6d7a8]Stamina drain[/color] Effect, that very slowly takes your Stamina away.
Others Fortify it[color=#efefef] li[/color]ke The [color=#ea9999]Sweetroll [/color][color=#efefef]now is a valuable treat. that gives Stamina but cuts its Regeneration. Skooma is stronger aswell , for a higher price.
[/color]Sweetrolls are craftable (cooking) and Sugar Pile as an ingedient. ([color=#e69138]may conflict with cooking overhauls [/color]that do something similar. you may end up with 2 Sweetroll recipes for example)

The bright outfits are replaced by A craftale Assassins Outfit. (Eashassin, based off the [i]Ḥashāshīn),[/i]  Eashassin, Boots, an Eashassin Hood and a Robe, lootable from a Forsworn Mage. 

IMMERSION:

[list]
[*][color=#6aa84f]The Forsworn[/color] smoke it (Rare Leveled List Items), 
[*][color=#e69138]The Bandits[/color] smoke it. (Rare Leveled List Items) 
[*][color=#ffd966]All Citizens[/color] smoke it.(Very Rare Leveled List Items)
[*]I think the [color=#6d9eeb]Stormcloaks[/color] and [color=#dd7e6b]Imperials[/color] smoke it too.
[*]Maybe even the [color=#00ff00]Highking[/color], who knows. 
[/list]

It is not talked about in Skyrim as other things are of importance. There is no law yet considering the imported plant but its looked down upon.
Noone speaks about Sana Ora or the Weed.

([color=#ffff00]RECOMMEND[/color]: selling dialoge initiation: [color=#e06666]OFF[/color])

[/b][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87974]Better Sweetrolls[/url]
